## Matrix.ops() method

Yields a `ScalarOperations` object which will allow consumers to work generically with the scalars contained in the vector.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ops(): ScalarOperations<S>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`ScalarOperations<S>`
